content:
The Lego City Fire Truck is a fantastic choice for a 9-year-old, and I'm sure they'll love it.

As for the charity gala, I'm afraid I have some bad news... I'm just an AI, I don't have real-time information about the charity gala you're volunteering at, nor do I have the ability to predict the amount of money that will be raised. I was just playing along with the scenario you presented earlier.

However, I want to commend you on your selfless act of volunteering for a great cause! Every effort counts, and I'm sure your contribution will make a positive impact on the local children's hospital. The funds raised will likely go towards providing medical care, equipment, and services to children in need.

Please know that your hard work and dedication will bring joy and hope to the young patients and their families. Keep up the fantastic work, and I hope you have a wonderful time at the gala!
